name: Cat Running Game
description:
So this is a simple game idea I had about a year ago. This is just a simple prototype I built to test out the concepts. In the game you play as a cat, jumping and smashing blue boxes while avoiding horrible red boxes. This is a sideways runner, so you never stop, at least until you touch the green box, which is supposed to a cat bed.

I currently don't have plans to further update this game, but still have the code so I could come back to this. So I am leaving comments open for constructive criticism of the game. If you would like to see more do let me know!

"Fun in a Bottle" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
